attributes.action: build more roads and widen the motorways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The car is the single best way to move people quickly and easily to different destinations. I am tired of hearing it said that more new roads simply means more traffic. We can only drive one car at any given time. If enough roads are built to cover this, then, providing the population is kept broadly the same, there will be enough room for all the motorists cars. 

It could be as simple as widening every motorway by one lane (still keep a hard shoulder). After all it is hardly as if the ground beside a motorway is a rich rain forrest of area of natural beauty since there is already a motorway next to it!
